snippet: The Obama administration wants the American, who was sentenced to 15 years of hard labor, to be granted “amnesty and immediate release.”
abstract: United States says North Korea should immediately release Kenneth Bae, American citizen sentenced to 15 years of hard labor; move sets up potential new source of confrontation between the two countries that could aggravate tensions over North Korea’s nuclear war threats.

byline.original: By CHOE SANG-HUN and RICK GLADSTONE
byline.contributor: Choe Sang-hun reported from Seoul, and Rick Gladstone from New York.

lead_paragraph: The Obama administration wants the American, who was sentenced to 15 years of hard labor, to be granted “amnesty and immediate release.”

headline.seo: United States Calls on North Korea to Free American
